wikipedia_page.main: John Peter Sloan (27 February 1969 – 25 May 2020) was an English actor, comedian, educator, writer and former musician who lived and worked in Italy.

response: *John Peter Sloan (1969–2020), English-born Italian actor, comedian and writer
*John Peter Sloan, 51, English comedian, theatre actor and writer, respiratory failure.È morto John Peter Sloan, il comico insegnante d'inglese più famoso d'Italia
